items.question: Can I bring my own food and cake?
Can I bring a DJ and loud music?
items.answer: Yes. Events with over 50 guests and alcohol require a police officer on site.

items.question: Do you offer tours?
items.answer: Yes. Call or text to schedule a tour.

items.question: Do you provide d√©cor?
items.answer: We provide tables, chairs, and optional linen rentals. Decorations are up to you.
